name: Pink Gum
description:
We invite you to live through this short artistic thought-provoking interactive experience that doesn't need a single word.
Ilusions, dreams and love will be chewed together in this too familiar tale, full of bubbles, innocence and pain...

A mouse-only story-driven game.
Headphones strongly recommended.
Between 15-25 minutes of playtime.

A Mad Cream Games production.
Directed by Agustín Pastore Burgos, with art by Inés Burgos Pía and music by Nicolás Pastore Burgos.

It is not intended for children.
